original_text:
Hades River of Souls
Nonostante la sinistra premessa, possiamo accettare questa missione, e Fantasma Games ha creato un mondo tenebroso in cui farlo. Una griglia a 5 rulli e 10 linee di pagamento si trova in un mondo sotterraneo frastagliato e cavernoso, in tutta la sua gloria spettrale. Il team creativo di Fantasma ha creato una grande scena, ma avrebbe potuto avere più impatto se la griglia fosse stata trasparente, così avremmo potuto vederne di più. Ad aggiungersi all’ostruzione visiva è un pannello sopra i rulli per i simboli speciali, che occupa ancora più spazio sullo schermo.
Una grafica infernale
Intorno all’area di gioco ciò che vediamo sono dirupi e scogliere, mentre scintille si alzano minacciosamente dal terreno. La scena provoca un brivido quando ci si chiede cosa succede alle povere anime laggiù. Ma guardiamo il lato positivo: questo è un cartone animato, non la realtà.
Per quanto riguarda l’esperienza sensoriale, l’audio merita una menzione. A volte ti si rizzano i capelli sulla nuca.
Non è difficile immaginare che un’eternità laggiù sia un destino piuttosto brutale. Fantasma ha incanalato alcuni di quei tempi difficili in un modello matematico altamente volatile. Esiste un potenziale decente, ma sappiate che rubare ricchezze dagli inferi non sarà una passeggiata. A bilanciare le cose, nel lungo periodo, c’è un solido RTP del 96,56%, così come una frequenza di successo di quasi uno su cinque (19,49%).
Giocabile su tutti i dispositivi da 20 centesimi a 100 euro per giro, i vincitori si verificano quando tre o più simboli corrispondenti atterrano su una delle 10 linee di pagamento – in entrambi i modi. Quindi le combinazioni vincenti pagano da sinistra a destra e da destra a sinistra, aumentando le tue possibilità.
La tabella dei pagamenti è una bella collezione di mitologia greca antica. Iniziando con i pagamenti bassi che Fantasma ha abilmente stilizzato dopo quei vecchi vasi che vedi nei musei intarsiati con corvi, serpenti, cervi, tori e leoni. Gli alti pagamenti, in ordine ascendente sono una specie di giroscopio, un elmo, Cerbero, Persefone, e naturalmente, Ade come simbolo di pagamento più prezioso.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Cinque simboli di Ade su una linea valgono 10 volte la puntata, che raddoppia a 20 grazie al pagamento in entrambi i sensi. Secondo la leggenda, Ade era il figlio più grande di Crono, e fu l’ultimo ad essere rigurgitato da lui. Chiaramente, questa esperienza gli fa guadagnare il diritto di essere a capo della tabella dei pagamenti.
La slot Hades: River of Souls ha un tema di mitologia greca e ti porta nell’antico corso d’acqua tra la Terra e gli inferi greci. Progettata con classe, c’è una colonna sonora piuttosto minacciosa che suona mentre giri e che si adatta perfettamente al tema degli inferi e dà al gioco molta atmosfera.
Anche le immagini sono ben posizionate. Sui rulli, vedrai 5 simboli di valore inferiore che sono abbelliti da motivi animali. Sono uniti da una cornucopia, un elmo da guerriero, il cane a tre teste Cerbero e una dea greca. La figura barbuta di Ade, dio degli Inferi, è il simbolo più remunerativo.
Il wild sostituisce tutti i simboli standard e offre anche premi fino a 10 x la puntata per una combo di 5 su una payline.
Le immagini colorate qui sono formidabili e la traccia di sottofondo dà al gioco un riempimento adeguatamente raccapricciante, specialmente quando si aggiungono le urla e gli strilli quando appare il teschio di Caronte.
L’Ade: River of Souls mobile slot funziona molto bene. Probabilmente avrete bisogno di altoparlanti decenti per ottenere l’effetto orchestrale completo, ma le immagini curate e il gameplay volatile rendono questa slot mobile molto giocabile.
Così come gli inferi non sono a corto di anime, la versione della slot non è a corto di caratteristiche. I giocatori ottengono caratteristiche di gioco base e bonus come Avalanches, Wild Souls Multipliers, il Teschio di Caronte, e Hades Free Spins.
Le valanghe appaiono in tutte le modalità di gioco, attivandosi ogni volta che c’è una vincita. Tutti i simboli della combinazione vincente vengono rimossi per lasciarne cadere di nuovi, fornendo più opportunità di vincita. Sopra i rulli, vengono visualizzati dei simboli speciali che i giocatori possono rintracciare e, si spera, far cadere quando si verificano le Avalanche.
I simboli wild sono la chiave del moltiplicatore Wild Souls che parte da x1. Il wild sostituisce qualsiasi simbolo a pagamento regolare e ogni 3 usati in una combinazione vincente aumentano il Wild Souls Multiplier di +1. Quando una sequenza Avalanche finisce, il moltiplicatore viene applicato alla vincita totale. Durante il gioco base, si resetta a x1 sui nuovi giri.
In quella che è probabilmente la più allegra rappresentazione di Caronte, il simbolo del teschio sorridente innesca la funzione The Skull of Charon. Il simbolo del teschio può apparire su qualsiasi giro, attivandosi quando non ci sono più combinazioni vincenti. Poi si sposta intorno ai rulli, rimuovendo 2-10 simboli regolari a caso per far cadere nuovi simboli per ulteriori possibilità di vincere.
Questo ci porta al punto culminante del gioco – Hades Free Spins. I simboli del Tridente d’oro sono quelli che vuoi qui, dato che 3 sui rulli assegnano 10 giri gratis. Qualsiasi tridente aggiuntivo in vista aggiunge altri 5 giri al totale, ciascuno. Durante i giri gratuiti, 3 wild vincenti aumentano il moltiplicatore di +2, con l’ulteriore vantaggio che non si azzera mai tra i giri.

raw_translation.response:
Hades River of Souls is a dark and thrilling slot game designed by Fantasma Games. The 5-reel, 10-payline grid is set in a gloomy underworld, creating a haunting atmosphere that will send shivers down your spine. The creative team behind the game has done an impressive job, although a transparent grid would have made it even more impactful. Additionally, the special symbol panel above the reels takes up a significant amount of screen space, adding to the visual obstruction.

The graphics are infernal, with cliffs, boulders, and sparks rising ominously from the ground. The audio is worth mentioning as well, with hair-raising sound effects that will transport you to the underworld.

This game boasts a highly volatile mathematical model that captures the brutal nature of eternal damnation. Stealing wealth from the underworld won't be easy, but with a solid RTP of 96.56% and a success rate of nearly one in five (19.49%), the rewards could be significant.

Playable on all devices with a minimum bet of 20 cents and a maximum bet of 100 euros per spin, Hades River of Souls offers double-way winning combinations, increasing your chances of success. The paytable features a collection of ancient Greek mythological symbols, including corvids, snakes, deer, bulls, and lions.

The game's lower-paying symbols are skillfully styled after old vases found in museums, while the higher-paying symbols include a spinning top, a warrior's helmet, Cerberus, Persephone, and, of course, the god of the underworld, Hades, as the most valuable symbol.

The wild symbol, which substitutes for all standard symbols, also offers prizes of up to 10x the bet for a combination of five on a payline. The colorful pictures are formidable, and the background music adds to the spine-chilling gameplay, especially when the screams and howls of the skull of Charon are heard.

The video slot is full of features, including the Avalanches, Wild Souls Multipliers, the Skull of Charon, and Hades Free Spins. The Avalanche feature is activated when a winning combination is formed, removing all symbols and causing new ones to fall, creating more opportunities for winning.

The special symbols above the reels can be tracked down and collected by players, hopefully leading to more Avalanche opportunities. The wild symbols are key to triggering the Wild Souls Multiplier, starting at x1 and increasing by +1 for every three used in a winning combination.

The smiling skull symbol of Charon triggers its own feature, removing 2-10 random regular symbols to make room for new ones, increasing the chance of winning. Finally, the Hades Free Spins feature is triggered by the gold Trident symbols, with three on the reels awarding ten free spins.

During the bonus round, three winning wilds increase the multiplier by +2, with the added benefit of never resetting between spins. Hades River of Souls is a game not to be missed by experienced gamblers who enjoy dark and thrilling gameplay.

raw_translation.response:
Hades River of Souls,
Despite its ominous premise, we are willing to undertake this mission, and Fantasma Games has created a haunting world in which to do so. A 5-reel, 10-payline grid is set in a rugged and cavernous underworld, in all its spectral glory. The Fantasma creative team has crafted a great scene, but it could have had more impact if the grid had been transparent, so we could have seen more of it. Added to the visual obstruction is a panel above the reels for special symbols, which takes up even more screen space.

An infernal graphic design,
Around the game area, what we see are cliffs and crags, while sparks menacingly rise from the ground. The scene is chilling when you wonder what happens to the poor souls down there. But let's look on the bright side: this is a cartoon, not reality. 

Regarding the sensory experience, the sound deserves mention here. Sometimes the hairs on the back of your neck stand up.

It is not difficult to imagine that an eternity down there is a rather brutal fate. Fantasma has channeled some of those difficult times into a highly volatile mathematical model. There is decent potential, but know that stealing riches from the underworld will not be a walk in the park. To balance things out, in the long run, there is a solid RTP of 96.56%, as well as a success frequency of almost one in five (19.49%). 

Playable on all devices from 20 cents to 100 euros per spin, winners occur when three or more matching symbols land on one of the 10 paylines - in both directions. So winning combinations pay from left to right and right to left, increasing your chances.

The paytable is a beautiful collection of ancient Greek mythology. Starting with the low payouts that Fantasma has skillfully stylized after those old vases you see in museums, decorated with crows, snakes, deer, bulls, and lions. The high payouts, in ascending order, are a kind of gyroscope, a warrior's helmet, Cerberus, Persephone, and of course, Hades as the most valuable payout symbol.

Features and symbols of the Slot Machine
Five Hades symbols on a line are worth 10 times the bet, doubling to 20 thanks to the bidirectional payout. According to legend, Hades was the oldest son of Cronos and was the last to be regurgitated by him. Clearly, this experience earns him the right to be at the top of the payout table.

The Hades: River of Souls slot has a theme of Greek mythology and takes you to the ancient river between Earth and the Greek underworld. Designed with class, there is a rather ominous soundtrack that plays while you spin and fits the underworld theme perfectly, giving the game a lot of atmosphere.

Even the images are well placed. On the reels, you will see 5 lower value symbols that are adorned with animal motifs. They are joined by a cornucopia, a warrior helmet, the three-headed dog Cerberus, and a Greek goddess. The bearded figure of Hades, god of the underworld, is the most lucrative symbol. 

The wild substitutes all standard symbols and also offers prizes up to 10 x the bet for a combo of 5 on a payline.

The colorful images here are formidable, and the background track gives the game an adequately chilling fill. Especially when screams and shrieks are added when Charon's skull appears.

The Hades: River of Souls mobile slot works very well. You'll probably need decent speakers to get the full orchestral effect, but the cultivated images and volatile gameplay make this mobile slot very playable.

Just as the underworld is not short of souls, the slot version is not short of features. Players get basic and bonus game features such as Avalanches, Wild Souls Multipliers, the Skull of Charon, and Hades Free Spins.

Avalanches appear in all game modes, triggering every time there is a win. All symbols in the winning combination are removed to make room for new ones, providing more winning opportunities. Above the reels, special symbols are displayed that players can track down and, hopefully, knock down when Avalanches occur.

Wild symbols are the key to the Wild Souls Multiplier, starting at x1. The wild replaces any regular paying symbol, and every 3 used in a winning combination increases the Wild Souls Multiplier by +1. When an Avalanche sequence ends, the multiplier is applied to the total win. During the base game, it resets to x1 on new spins.

In what is probably the most cheerful representation of Charon, the smiling skull symbol triggers The Skull of Charon feature. The skull symbol can appear on any spin, being activated when there are no more winning combinations. Then it moves around the reels, removing 2-10 random regular symbols to make room for new symbols for further winning opportunities.

This brings us to the climax of the game - Hades Free Spins. The gold Trident symbols are the ones you want here, with 3 on the reels awarding 10 free spins. Any additional Trident in view adds another 5 spins to the total, each. During free spins, 3 winning wilds increase the multiplier by +2, with the added advantage that it never resets between spins.

Questo ci porta al punto culminante del gioco – Hades Free Spins. I simboli del Tridente d’oro sono quelli che vuoi qui, dato che 3 sui rulli assegnano 10 giri gratis. Qualsiasi tridente aggiuntivo in vista aggiunge altri 5 giri al totale, ciascuno. Durante i giri gratuiti, 3 wild vincenti aumentano il moltiplicatore di +2, con l’ulteriore vantaggio che non si azzera mai tra i giri.

message.content:
Hades River of Souls,
Despite its ominous premise, we are willing to undertake this mission, and Fantasma Games has created a haunting world in which to do so. A 5-reel, 10-payline grid is set in a rugged and cavernous underworld, in all its spectral glory. The Fantasma creative team has crafted a great scene, but it could have had more impact if the grid had been transparent, so we could have seen more of it. Added to the visual obstruction is a panel above the reels for special symbols, which takes up even more screen space.

An infernal graphic design,
Around the game area, what we see are cliffs and crags, while sparks menacingly rise from the ground. The scene is chilling when you wonder what happens to the poor souls down there. But let's look on the bright side: this is a cartoon, not reality. 

Regarding the sensory experience, the sound deserves mention here. Sometimes the hairs on the back of your neck stand up.

It is not difficult to imagine that an eternity down there is a rather brutal fate. Fantasma has channeled some of those difficult times into a highly volatile mathematical model. There is decent potential, but know that stealing riches from the underworld will not be a walk in the park. To balance things out, in the long run, there is a solid RTP of 96.56%, as well as a success frequency of almost one in five (19.49%). 

Playable on all devices from 20 cents to 100 euros per spin, winners occur when three or more matching symbols land on one of the 10 paylines - in both directions. So winning combinations pay from left to right and right to left, increasing your chances.

The paytable is a beautiful collection of ancient Greek mythology. Starting with the low payouts that Fantasma has skillfully stylized after those old vases you see in museums, decorated with crows, snakes, deer, bulls, and lions. The high payouts, in ascending order, are a kind of gyroscope, a warrior's helmet, Cerberus, Persephone, and of course, Hades as the most valuable payout symbol.

Features and symbols of the Slot Machine
Five Hades symbols on a line are worth 10 times the bet, doubling to 20 thanks to the bidirectional payout. According to legend, Hades was the oldest son of Cronos and was the last to be regurgitated by him. Clearly, this experience earns him the right to be at the top of the payout table.

The Hades: River of Souls slot has a theme of Greek mythology and takes you to the ancient river between Earth and the Greek underworld. Designed with class, there is a rather ominous soundtrack that plays while you spin and fits the underworld theme perfectly, giving the game a lot of atmosphere.

Even the images are well placed. On the reels, you will see 5 lower value symbols that are adorned with animal motifs. They are joined by a cornucopia, a warrior helmet, the three-headed dog Cerberus, and a Greek goddess. The bearded figure of Hades, god of the underworld, is the most lucrative symbol. 

The wild substitutes all standard symbols and also offers prizes up to 10 x the bet for a combo of 5 on a payline.

The colorful images here are formidable, and the background track gives the game an adequately chilling fill. Especially when screams and shrieks are added when Charon's skull appears.

The Hades: River of Souls mobile slot works very well. You'll probably need decent speakers to get the full orchestral effect, but the cultivated images and volatile gameplay make this mobile slot very playable.

Just as the underworld is not short of souls, the slot version is not short of features. Players get basic and bonus game features such as Avalanches, Wild Souls Multipliers, the Skull of Charon, and Hades Free Spins.

Avalanches appear in all game modes, triggering every time there is a win. All symbols in the winning combination are removed to make room for new ones, providing more winning opportunities. Above the reels, special symbols are displayed that players can track down and, hopefully, knock down when Avalanches occur.

Wild symbols are the key to the Wild Souls Multiplier, starting at x1. The wild replaces any regular paying symbol, and every 3 used in a winning combination increases the Wild Souls Multiplier by +1. When an Avalanche sequence ends, the multiplier is applied to the total win. During the base game, it resets to x1 on new spins.

In what is probably the most cheerful representation of Charon, the smiling skull symbol triggers The Skull of Charon feature. The skull symbol can appear on any spin, being activated when there are no more winning combinations. Then it moves around the reels, removing 2-10 random regular symbols to make room for new symbols for further winning opportunities.

This brings us to the climax of the game - Hades Free Spins. The gold Trident symbols are the ones you want here, with 3 on the reels awarding 10 free spins. Any additional Trident in view adds another 5 spins to the total, each. During free spins, 3 winning wilds increase the multiplier by +2, with the added advantage that it never resets between spins.
